mapper.select: select r.*,h.owner_name as `houseOwner.ownerName`,h.owner_phone as `houseOwner.ownerPhone`, i.house_number as `houseOwner.houseInfo.houseNumber`,a.admin_name as `admin.adminName` from repair r left join house_owner h on h.owner_id=r.owner_id left join house_info i on i.house_id=h.house_id left join admin a on a.admin_id=r.admin_id
select admin_id as `admin.adminId` from repair where repair_id=#{repairId}
